pr_title: Mark issues as stale automatically using stale bot

timeline.bodyText: maybe we should add Epic here as well?
timeline.author: inodb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 90
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 14
+# Issues with these labels will never be considered stale
+exemptLabels:
+  - pinned
+  - security
+  - critical
+  - priority
